show-the-character-name-in-roll-results: Show the character name in roll results
prompt-for-aim-action-when-rolling-attac: Demander pour la visée lors du lancer de jets d'attaque
aim-value-a-value-must-be-entered-here: Value du visé (un nombre DOIT être entré ici)
show-the-power-list: Show the Power list in the Character tab
show-the-spell/arcana-list: Show the Spell/Arcana list in the Character tab
show-the-mana/magic-points-section: Afficher la section Mana/Points de Magie
show-the-fatigue-section: Afficher la section de la Fatigue
show-the-conviction-section: Afficher la section de la Conviction
show-the-corruption-section: Afficher la section de la Corruption
color-selection-info: Select the color for the character sheet section headers and buttons.
whisp-rolls-gm-info: DOES NOT WORK WITH THE API SCRIPT YET, THE SUMMARY WILL NOT WHISPERED TO THE GM. All sheet rolls are sent to all players in chat by default. Query Whisper option gives you a prompt with each roll of whether or not the roll should be sent privately only to yourself and the GM. Always Whisper Rolls will send all rolls only to yourself and the GM.
aim-toggle-default: Prompt for Aim action when rolling attacks
aim-value-default-info: The default value for the aim bonus when using the Aim prompt. It should be 1 unless a power or talent changes it.
show-the-mana/magic-points-section-info: Afficher la section Mana/Points de Magie.
show-the-fatigue-section-info: Show the Fatigue section. This should be shown for Blue Rose.
show-the-conviction-section-info: Show the Conviction section. This should be shown for Blue Rose.
show-the-corruption-section-info: Show the Corruption section. This can be shown for Blue Rose.
show-the-ammo-column-info: Show the Ammo column. This can be hidden for Blue Rose.
show-the-money/currency-section-info: Show the Money/Currency section. This can be hidden for Blue Rose.
